ygData.subject: Re: red peoples
ygData.msgSnippet: next time you might want to read the instructions... its all in the manual that came with the program. ... From: enigma [mailto:enigma@xsploitz.com] Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
next time you might want to read the instructions... its all in the manual
that came with the program.

-----Original Message-----
From: enigma [mailto:enigma@...]
Sent: Friday, April 09, 1999 3:08 PM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] red peoples


From: enigma <enigma@...>

Do you all agree with the red pvp stuff? i dont, when i was just starting i
gave the book to the priest *before i knew how to read it because wheni
played the demo i couldn't figure it out either* and am red, and as of last
night i found out another thing that will suck in the future, and i dont
want to start another character because im already a level 9 necromancer,
noone can cure diseases or heal me unless they are red too... this seems
like overkill to me and verant needs to change some things.

Naelie
